Award.AwardTitle: Conference Grant Proposal for Planning Meeting of Workshop on Medical Device Innovation Using Cyber Physical Systems

Directorate.LongName: Directorate for Computer & Information Science & Engineering

Division.LongName: Division of Computer and Network Systems

Award.AbstractNarration: This NSF award supports a planning workshop on Innovation in Medical Cyber-Physical Systems. This activity arises from an interagency exploration of emerging CPS research directions. The meeting will develop plans for further assessment by the CPS community of biomedical research needs and opportunities. The meeting and subsequent community-wide assessment are conducted in the context of the interagency High Confidence Software and Systems Coordinating Group.
